class.name: VisualShaderNodeColorConstant
class.brief_description: A [Color] constant to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Has two output ports representing RGB and alpha channels of [Color]. Translated to [code]vec3 rgb[/code] and [code]float alpha[/code] in the shader language.

members.member: A [Color] constant which represents a state of this node.
